recipesJson.name: A&W root beer revisited
recipesJson.author: Conradvape
recipesJson.description: So if anyone has ever tried my original A&W root beer float and thought it was good well I got a good tip and inverted it into this one and with the 2 different root beer flavors in this one they give it alil more spice with a nice smooth ice cream notes in the background give this one a shot guys U might like this one better
